title: vELai pozudu
sahitya:
vELai pozhudhu kidaiyaadhaa vLaiyaada
viNNagar vEndhE sree oppiliappa unakku  
[vElai]

anupallavi

naaLai nam kaiyil illaiyenRu aRinthum 
maaLaa ippiRaiyil maandthargaLai varuththa 
[vElai]

caraNam

aadhaara srudhiYyE aanandha nidhiyE
vEdha swaroopanE geethaiyin naayaganE
padhiyE nee en gathiyE kaNNaa
sruthiyE enakku manam kanindhu udhavidaamal  

[vElai]
